channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Tornado outbreak concerns grow in U.S. And, Hamas-Israel talks hit impasse
item.description: Many Kentucky residents are bracing for storms as they recover from deadly weather over the weekend. And, the latest on negotiations between Israel an...

item.title: A broken thruster jeopardized Voyager 1, but engineers executed a remote fix
item.description: NASA mission controllers raced against time to find a solution before a crucial ground-based radio used for communicating with Voyagers 1 and 2, went ...

item.title: Trump gives House Republicans a 'pep talk' to close divides on massive tax bill
item.description: President Trump spoke to House Republicans on Capitol Hill on Tuesday to persuade holdouts in his party to back a massive tax bill that includes cuts ...

item.title: Doctors urged to treat pain for IUD insertion and other procedures
item.description: A major medical group now recommends pain-blocking treatments for IUD insertion and other procedures amid a growing recognition that women's pain shou...

item.title: 'Dilbert' creator Scott Adams says he's dying of 'the same cancer that Joe Biden has'
item.description: Adams said he expects "to be checking out from this domain sometime this summer." The controversial cartoonist, a vocal supporter of President Trump, ...

item.title: Biden's cancer diagnosis raises fresh questions about his health in White House
item.description: The news that he has "aggressive" prostate cancer has some medics asking why it was not detected sooner.

item.title: Iran's Khamenei doubts US nuclear talks will lead to agreement
item.description: "We don't think it will lead to any outcome," the supreme leader warns, saying the US is making "outrageous" demands on uranium enrichment.

item.title: Why bonding is the heart of infant care
item.description: In "The Baby Bonding Book," Dr. Joanna Parga-Belinkie helps overwhelmed new parents focus on what truly matters in the early stages of parenting build...

item.title: French police launch prison hunt for mini Chinese-made phones
item.description: The phones, no bigger than a cigarette-lighter, were being used to mastermind crimes from inside jail.

item.title: Elon Musk says he will cut back on political spending after heavily backing Trump in 2024
Early heatwave raises health risks for pregnant women, experts warn
item.description: Dr. Celine Gounder joins to explain how extreme heat, intensified by climate change, poses growing dangers for pregnant women especially as temperatur...

item.title: Creationism still widespread and science educators still alarmed 100 years post Scopes trial
item.description: The 1925 Scopes monkey trial famously put the spotlight on evolution and appeared to mark a defeat for biblical fundamentalism.

item.title: Benito Skinner brings heart and humor to new series, "Overcompensating"

item.title: Zelensky accuses Russia of 'buying time' to stall truce talks
item.description: It follows Donald Trump saying Russia and Ukraine will "immediately" start negotiating, after a two-hour phone call with Vladimir Putin.

item.title: Spain clamps down on Airbnb as tourism backlash returns for summer
item.description: The Spanish government calls for the removal of almost 66,000 property listings saying they breach tourism rules.

item.title: Greg Tarzan Davis switches sides in "Mission: Impossible – The Final Reckoning"

item.title: Maintenance worker arrested in New Orleans jail escape
item.description: Ten inmates escaped from a New Orleans jail late last week, sparking a manhunt for the group.

item.title: More severe weather pummels the central US as thousands recover from deadly tornadoes
